TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi Paragraph extends System.Windows.Documents.Block

summary.span: 用來將內容群組到段落的區塊層級非固定格式內容項目。

span.span: A block-level flow content element used to group content into a paragraph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會強制執行強式的內容模型的子內容。 enforces a strong content model for child content. 請參閱[TextElement 內容模型概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md)如需詳細資訊內容模型。See [TextElement Content Model Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/textelement-content-model-overview.md) for more information about the content model. 除了純文字項目可以主控其他項目。In addition to plain text, a element can host other elements. 有效的子項目包括：Valid child elements include: - - - - - - - - - - 請參閱[非固定格式文件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md)如需有關這個物件可以包含與項目可以包含它。See [Flow Document Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/flow-document-overview.md) for more information on what this object can contain and what can contain it.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值指定當分頁符號或分欄符號中斷 時，可以在中斷前留下的最少行數。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates no minimum.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常叫用這個方法如果您正在開發的設計工具或是開發您自己的控制項併入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ TextDecorations { System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::TextDecorationCollection ^ value); };
member this.TextDecorations : System.Windows.TextDecorationCollection with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，它包含要套用至這個項目的文字裝飾。

span.span: Gets or sets a that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 集合，包含要套用至這個項目的文字裝飾。

span.span: A collection that contains text decorations to apply to this element.

value.span: 值表示不會套用文字修飾。

span.span: A value of means no text decorations will be applied.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件是您可以新增至文字的視覺裝飾。A object is a visual ornamentation you can add to text. 有四種類型的文字裝飾： 底線、 基準、 刪除線和頂線。There are four types of text decorations: underline, baseline, strikethrough, and overline. 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。For more information about text decorations, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何設定 的 屬性。The following example shows how to set the property of a . [!code-xaml[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDecXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#_paragraph_textdecxaml)] [!code-csharp[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#_paragraph_textdec)] [!code-vb[InlineSnippets#_Paragraph_TextDec](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/InlineSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#_paragraph_textdec)] 下圖顯示此範例的轉譯方式。The following figure shows how this example renders. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設刪除線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-strike.png "Screenshot: Text with default strikethrough effect") 下圖顯示如何**頂線**，**基準**，並**底線**分別裝飾呈現。The following figures show how the **Overline**, **Baseline**, and **Underline** decorations render, respectively. ![螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 頂線 TextDecorator")![Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator](~/add/media/inline-textdec-over.png "Screenshot: Overline TextDecorator") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 預設基準線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text](~/add/media/inline-textdec-base.png "Screenshot: Default baseline effect on text") ![螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 套用預設底線效果的文字")![Screenshot: Text with default underline effect](~/add/media/inline-textdec-under.png "Screenshot: Text with default underline effect")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示 的第一行要內縮多少。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how far to indent the first line of a .

value.span: 雙精度浮點數值，用來指定段落的第一行要內縮多少 (以與裝置無關的像素為單位)。

span.span: A double value specifying the amount to indent the first line of the paragraph, in device independent pixels.
The default value is 0.
